title: WBR Tag
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <wbr> tag specifies where in a text it would be fine to add a line-break.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Using <wbr> tag to specify line break.
usageExamples.code: This is a veryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryveryvery long text.With a break in the middle.
